SEARCH
Package gw.currency.fxrate

Class CCDefaultFXRateBuilder

java.lang.Object
gw.currency.fxrate.DefaultFXRateBuilder<CCDefaultFXRateBuilder>
gw.currency.fxrate.CCDefaultFXRateBuilder
All Implemented Interfaces:
FXRateBuilder<DefaultFXRate,CCDefaultFXRateBuilder>
public class CCDefaultFXRateBuilder extends DefaultFXRateBuilder<CCDefaultFXRateBuilder>
A builder class for creating instances of DefaultFXRate with specific configurations in ClaimCenter.

This builder provides methods to simplify the creation of FX rates.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    CCDefaultFXRateBuilder()
    Constructs a new CCDefaultFXRateBuilder instance with default settings.
    CCDefaultFXRateBuilder(ExchangeRate exchangeRate)
    Constructs a new CCDefaultFXRateBuilder instance using the provided ExchangeRate object.
    CCDefaultFXRateBuilder(FXExchangeRate fxExchangeRate)
    Constructs a new CCDefaultFXRateBuilder instance using the provided FXExchangeRate object.
    CCDefaultFXRateBuilder(FXRate fxRate)
    Constructs a new CCDefaultFXRateBuilder instance with the values copied from the given FXRate, then calls the ICCDefaultFXRateBuilderCustomInitializerPlugin (if enabled) to perform any custom initialization.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type

    Description
    CCDefaultFXRateBuilder

  • Constructor Details

    • CCDefaultFXRateBuilder

      public CCDefaultFXRateBuilder()
      Constructs a new CCDefaultFXRateBuilder instance with default settings.

    • CCDefaultFXRateBuilder

      public CCDefaultFXRateBuilder(FXRate fxRate)
      Constructs a new CCDefaultFXRateBuilder instance with the values copied from the given FXRate, then calls the ICCDefaultFXRateBuilderCustomInitializerPlugin (if enabled) to perform any custom initialization.
      Parameters:
      fxRate - the FXRate to copy values from

    • CCDefaultFXRateBuilder

      public CCDefaultFXRateBuilder(ExchangeRate exchangeRate)
      Constructs a new CCDefaultFXRateBuilder instance using the provided ExchangeRate object.

      This constructor initializes the builder with values copied from the given ExchangeRate. If the provided exchange rate set is not marked as market rates, it adjusts the builder to treat market rates as manual.

      Finally, it calls the ICCDefaultFXRateBuilderCustomInitializerPlugin (if enabled) to perform any custom initialization.

      Parameters:
      exchangeRate - the ExchangeRate object from which to copy values

    • CCDefaultFXRateBuilder

      public CCDefaultFXRateBuilder(FXExchangeRate fxExchangeRate)
      Constructs a new CCDefaultFXRateBuilder instance using the provided FXExchangeRate object.

      Initializes the builder with values copied from the given FXExchangeRate.

      Parameters:
      fxExchangeRate - the FXExchangeRate object to copy values from

  • Method Details

    • withMarketAsManual

      public CCDefaultFXRateBuilder withMarketAsManual(Currency fromCurrency, Currency toCurrency, BigDecimal rate)
      Sets the market as manual and specifies the from currency, to currency, and rate.
      Parameters:
      fromCurrency - the currency from which the conversion starts, must not be null
      toCurrency - the currency to which the conversion is made, must not be null
      rate - the exchange rate value, must not be null
      Returns:
      this builder instance for method chaining

    • withMarketAsManual

      public CCDefaultFXRateBuilder withMarketAsManual()
      Sets the market as manual with the current date as the market time and null as the retrieved time.
      Returns:
      this builder instance for method chaining
